channel.title: Im new i need help on how to add shops and change prices and items stats
channel.description:
Im new to the whole runescape private server thing and i just needed someone to tell me: -How to add shops -How to change the prices of the items in the shops -How to change items from null to their actual item -How to change weapon stats -How to add teleports to the emote tab -And how to add a general store so u can sell anything to it for reduced price
There are much more things i need to learn and want to learn And its ok im not like those peoplewho you have to tell them what to do over and over im a fast learner.
If someone could tell me how to do these things or post a video link i can watch that would be awesome :)
PS: I've tried watching tutorials on moparscape and it says i am not allowed to view them or they're not available to me if anyone knows why could you tell me that also?
Thanks -SS

item.title: Im new i need help on how to add shops and change prices and items stats
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

If you can’t code .cfg files then no offence, you don’t stand a chance at java.

Read full topic

item.title: Im new i need help on how to add shops and change prices and items stats

item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

[quote=“poopydoody33, post:3, topic:293563”]That doesnt really help lol
i need codes for the shops and like where to put them
so pretty much i need a video tutorial :([/quote]

[b]3) We are not a spoonfeeding community.[b]

He told you the file to put them in, you can EASILY read the files, and find out what to do by simply looking at the other formats.

Read full topic

item.title: Im new i need help on how to add shops and change prices and items stats
item.dc:creator: @poopydoody33 poopydoody33
item.description:
@poopydoody33 wrote:

Im new to the whole runescape private server thing and i just needed someone to tell me:
-How to add shops
-How to change the prices of the items in the shops
-How to change items from null to their actual item
-How to change weapon stats
-How to add teleports to the emote tab
-And how to add a general store so u can sell anything to it for reduced price

There are much more things i need to learn and want to learn
And its ok im not like those peoplewho you have to tell them what to do over and over
im a fast learner.

If someone could tell me how to do these things or post a video link i can watch that would be awesome

PS: I’ve tried watching tutorials on moparscape and it says i am not allowed to view them or they’re not available to me
if anyone knows why could you tell me that also?

Thanks
-SS
